website_summaries.verdict: Stands apart from competitor watches. The wood grain design is attractive and the watch is full of features. You won't find a wooden watch with more to offer.
pros: Garners praise for its gorgeous looks and lightweight feel on the wrist
Impressive features include 3 sub-dials, stop watch, and date window
Available in black or red sandalwood or a combination of both
cons: A few noted quality concerns including breakage of the second hand

customer_reviews.title: I would give this 10 stars if I could !
customer_reviews.text: This watch is amazing. It looks great and is very light weight! The customer service is wonderful. Amazon lost my package so I contacted the company directly and they sent me a free replacement watch even though it was not their fault the package was lost. They also made sure the watch would arrive in time for me to give the watch to my husband for our 5th wedding anniversary. The watch is so great I will be buying more for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Eleonore

customer_reviews.title: 24 hours so far and I love it. Very light and the best part is ...
customer_reviews.text: 24 hours so far and I love it. Very light and the best part is it works. Stopwatch function is great, the 3 extra dials are for this function only and even looks cool when you use it(one of the hands or two(depending on timer or stopwatch) will spin once per second and another hand does 1 spin per rwo seconds. OVERALL.... Great price Great look Great funtion Got here fast in 1 day. I would recomend this watch to anyone wanting a unique wooden watch that funtions and really does look good.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Loves it but band broke!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch for my husband for our anniversary and he loves it! He is however disappointed no because after wearing it only occasionally due to it seeming fragile it had broken. The band fell off on one end and luckily he realized and didn't lose his watch but I would like to exchange it or return it for new one. Please let me know how to proceed with this. I am hoping that you will take care of this since he has only worn it a handful of times in two months since I gave it to him. Thanks so much and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
customer_reviews.author: Asneng

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Excellent Customer Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I first received a watch which had some issues with it, stopped working after a few days. However, I reached out to the company and they did everything in their power to make me a satisfied customer. (Offering refund or a new watch due to the defective one). I ended up getting another watch because I love how stylish/simplistic/light the watch feels. The new watch is great and I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Timeloader

customer_reviews.title: A hit christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13 year old nephew who loves watches. He wanted one that was wooden so I shopped around. I loved the look of this one and so did he. He loved this watch as soon as he opened it (it came in a very nice box to keep it safe while shipped). It was a very good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband. It is absolutely gorgeous! He is not really a jewelry person but it is very lightweight and compliments any outfit. Also, had a question about adjusting the links and the customer service was very prompt and professional. Definitely recommend this watch and company!
customer_reviews.author: AdamsMommy

customer_reviews.title: I am really disappointed by this watch
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed by this watch. First it is beautiful... exactly as I wanted for my husband to celebrate our 5th anniversary. HOWEVER, I had to order three AND none of them worked out. The first never arrived -- the package was lost. I received a refund and ordered a 2nd. The 2nd arrived and the pins didn't pull out to set all the features. So, we returned it and ordered a 3rd one AND the pins didn't pull out of this one either!! I've returned and we will not be ordering again. I am very disappointed. Maybe I'll look at another style...
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A. White

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking watch made of Wood
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a present for my husband because he has a metal allergy and also because he is fascinated with wood items and especially watches. He loves that all the dials work well, the watch was easy to set the time and the other dials. It was a bit cumbersome to remove a link himself but he did it successfully.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Wood

customer_reviews.title: This watch is awesome. I am a wood worker and build/repair violin ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awesome. I am a wood worker and build/repair violin bows, so I know a top-quality wood piece when I see it. This watch is polished perfectly, the wood is highly grained, the band is substantial and solid, and the chrome buttons are very distinguished and elegant. Overall, I am so pleased with this watch. I had a minor problem when my watch arrived, but the Seller responded immediately and made everything right - Top Notch Service. Than you Eco Life!!
customer_reviews.author: Dad of 5

customer_reviews.title: Great looking...and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks better in person than it does in the photos. It came yesterday and is too small for my 9 inch wrist, so I contacted the seller. They immediately agreed to send me a defective watch that I could use for extra links.. Talk about great customer service!!! 02/08 Update: I received the parts watch and moved two links over to mine. Getting the retainers back on the links was a challenge, but I eventually got them secured. Now I wear the watch every week and it looks great! I'm really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ChuckM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I bought my husband 2 watches for this Christmas, - a very expensive Diesel and this Bewell wood watch. This is the watch that he wears everyday! He loves this watch! I will be purchasing one for myself as well.
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTAL JACKSON-WILSON

customer_reviews.title: He loved the design
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my Vegan brother in law for his 60th birthday. He loved the design. He also read all the enclosures and was so appreciative that trees were replanted when they were cut down and that it was all made of natural materials.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni N C

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I. Love. It. The clock works well. Didn't care much about the chronography but it looks nice as a decoration. The wood with the colors are amazing. Very light. Easily adjustable size. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Arsany Basily

customer_reviews.title: very light and a great conversation starter
customer_reviews.text: The watch is stunning-looking, very light and a great conversation starter. The buttons to control the timer do not "click" which is a weird feeling. Bt I don't use the stop watch anyway. Six stars to their customer service! Highly responsive, and willing to help, even when the problem I had was my fault (lost 2 of the small caps that hold the pins in place).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s junk.
customer_reviews.text: This watch will fall apart if you have to remove a link. I’ve been through two. While it’s a good looking watch the pin system they use to hold the links together is about as cheap as possible. They are held only by pressure and glue. The glue being these tiny metal 0 cylinders the pin slides into. The watch cannot be properly put back together once you remove a link. Both have fallen apart within a few hours of use. I should also mention that it took an incredible amount of effort to take the pins out and put them back in.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Get ready for non stop complements! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! Purchased for Father's Day. Purchased same brand different style for husband's Birthday / Valentine's Day this year and he wears it all the time and gets complements wherever he goes. People literally stop what they're doing and ask about it and fawn over it! Great quality on both, very pretty! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly B

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this watch and it's gorgeous! I love how light it is. The clasp is a really nice touch. I'm a little concerned about the durability of the crystal, but I guess we'll see. Seems like a great price for a great looking and unique watch.
customer_reviews.author: R Woody

customer_reviews.title: This watch truly is beautiful. I bought it for my husband for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: This watch truly is beautiful. I bought it for my husband for Christmas, and he loves it. Additionally, the company is responsive to contact. However, even though it comes with the tool to add and remove links, it's still a good idea to take it to a jeweler. The links are difficult to remove and once the pin has been removed, the smaller holder piece on the other side (I don't know what to call it) doesn't want to stay in. My husband almost lost the watch because we added a link. The smaller piece popped out, and he only noticed when he heard the watch hit the ground. I ended up using super glue to keep the thing together.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty cheap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a gift based on the other reviews, and I am convinced they have changed the product quality because the item I received looked so cheaply made it was kind of insulting. I know obviously at the price point this isn't going to be plated in gold or anything, but the pictures in the reviews looked nothing like what I got. The face of the watch was a fake wood grain brushed metal, not wood. The wooden band looked like it was made from balsa wood and had a ton of splintery type imperfections all throughout. It just looked awful. I returned it promptly.
customer_reviews.author: M. W.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but possibly flimsy design
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this watch. The first time there was an issue with the clasp coming undone. The replacement watch came with a scratched face so that was enough to steer me away. If you need something for an event/something lower priority I could reccomend this watch but if you regularly wear watches, such as a businessman or similar, I cannot reccomend this watch. It is really beautiful and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Loli

customer_reviews.title: My second one, but keep breaking
customer_reviews.text: I hate to write a less than 5 review, because I love these watches and think they look great. This is my second one, which I got for Christmas. But within a few weeks, a wooden link broke without warning...this is a link that is fixed in the band, not able to be removed. I'm afraid I'm going to have to look for another brand of a wooden watch, as I have not found a way to contact the seller to ask for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Heath A. Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: This watch is beautiful, as described and shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful, as described and shown in the picture, very elegant , however i was confronted with the traditional wrist size issue, which led me to follow instructions on how to calibrate the watch .Its not easy , not easy at all , matter of fact its so hard to do that the watch fell from my wrist without me noticing 2 days after purchasing it . I lost it like that, and had to buy another one of a different model but from the same brand and I got confronted with another issues that i will describe in the review of that watch. Overall its a beautiful product
customer_reviews.author: Amadou

customer_reviews.title: Not What it Used to Be.
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. I ordered a similar one from Bewell a couple years ago and had no trouble. This one was missing the screws that hold the pins inside the wristband. It’s usel as a watch because it is constantly falling apart. I’m disappointed. My previous experience was 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie M Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Be careful changing the band size.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking watch but we needed to take some links out because it was too big. After popping out the pins like I thought the instructions said (the print was so tiny I could have been wrong about the instructions) I lost some tiny pin size pieces that belonged to it. I never got it back together the way it should have been so I ended up gluing the pins back in.
customer_reviews.author: Yankee Cat

customer_reviews.title: Bon Marche
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know it had a stopwatch! Its nice watch and feels good on the wrist. I don't think the crome accents should be crome, instead they should be copper to match the face. I would go with turqoiuse stone too. Easy to see the date unless its the 15th minute of every hour, dont know how you can fix that since fifteen is my fourth favorite number but oh well. Thanks for making this ethically sustainable watch. I like it so far. Also, while changing the size of the wristband I lost a couple washers from the pin extraction. Maybe use an Aristotle helix at the end of the pin instead of the washer thing.
customer_reviews.author: Giq

customer_reviews.title: It looks great, but does not work
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, but it does not function at all. I have bought 2 of these now and the minute hand just freely spins on both of them setting the date can be tricky. Also do not get ANY water neat them Its too bad because I really like the way they look. 2 Stars for style points 0 Stars for execution
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 6 hours
customer_reviews.text: ***Update: After contacting costumer service and sending pictures, they quickly offered to send a replacement. Excellent customer service.*** My daughters gave this to my spouse for Christmas and he wore it for the first time to the office. Within 6 hours, a silver piece from the watch front fell off. He works at a desk job as an MBA, there was nothing to explain a brand-new watch falling apart immediately. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: Made a nice gift for my husband. Looks great, but was challenging to adjust the size of the watch band. Also one of the pins randomly came out (not one we took out to adjust the size) while he was wearing it. We could not get the pin to stay in, so we had to take it to a healer to be fixed. A bit of a pain, but now it looks nice and functions well.
customer_reviews.author: EmJo

customer_reviews.title: I got a used one...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my good friends as gifts, 1 was brand new so that was great yet the other I feel was a returned used watch as the band was separated an not all the parts were in the box. An just seen 1 of the pegs are broken to hold the wrist band
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for those who have everything
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband - and it’s even more beautiful in person - the internet doesn’t do it justice. He loves the watch! And frankly, I do too. I will admit, it speaks to the tree hugger in me, but the biggest factor is the aesthetics, unique concept, and functionality. I love it. Ill buy more.
customer_reviews.author: jacki

customer_reviews.title: Sold as new, but obviously used
customer_reviews.text: Item should be new, but is used. Box is marked “display”, has been unsealed, and is running. Battery should not be engaged. If it’s not a store display item, it’s a returned item that is being resold. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool watch, but the pins are impossible to replace.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend, so i thought i would go ahead and size it for him, after removing some links, the pins are held in by a little metal peace on one side, but they fall out and i cannot get them to hold, will probably have my friend try it on, add the pin and metal piece and secure it with a dab of super glue. Fix the pins and it is 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is nice to look at and light but it is absolute junk. First one I got, the stop watch didn’t work and I couldn’t change the date. The second I got as a replacement, the stop watch again was broken and it was hard to change the date. Don’t bother with this watch unless you want it to always be wrong. After I returned both, the seller did contact me and was willing to make me happy. I had received a different watch that I had picked out that was very simple with a fabric wristband. It does work as it should and my boyfriend does like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie C.

customer_reviews.title: The watch stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Liked how the watch looked. The instructions included were very hard to read the font was to small. Bewell later emailed instructions that could be downloaded and were much better to read. About sex weeks after receiving the watch it stopped working. I will be calling to have them fix or I will return for refund of my purchase price
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: An amazing deal on a very good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to watches, I am VERY picky. This watch nails it. Super lightweight, very attractive and VERY affordable. I just received it so my review is a bit premature for durability but at 40 bucks, if it lasts me 6 months to a year, I would buy another one. Its that nice. I have another one coming already, the same color scheme (black sandalwood) but with the square face. I'll be adding a couple more to my watch collection from these guys. Good looking watches, priced right!
customer_reviews.author: M. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Watch
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband. He loved it, it's beautiful. However, it scratches easily and it's very difficult to add/remove links. In the process, parts got damaged as well due to the difficulty. We were able to add/remove links but it took a long time... All-in-all it fits, he wears it. I probably should not order another one...
customer_reviews.author: Some Girl

customer_reviews.title: Went from 🤷🏾‍♂️ to 😁👍🏿
customer_reviews.text: All the hands don't move and and the stopwatch doesn't work properly but I like the watch because it's unique but hate the it not working. Update: Customer service contacted me about the problem and worked fast to get another watch out to me. They were nice, speedy, and wasted no time fixing the problem. My dad Christmas and birthday was save thank you for making it possible. I love this company and their watches are a most get.
customer_reviews.author: CeCe Gates

customer_reviews.title: Broken *update* but they are shipping a new one.
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks beautiful but the band fell apart immediately and it's impossible to fix the band, the pins are cheap and they just fall out, so wear the watch is useless! Huge disappointment. *Update* - The seller has been in contact with me and are shipping me a replacement, Props to them for reaching out and making sure my problem is being addressed and taken care of, will come back with a full update once I have received the new watch!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Uniqueness
customer_reviews.text: When sizing watch pin removal was easy but it comprises the integrity of pin and it keeps popping out which causes ban to come un done and watch to fall.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality for a cheap watch
customer_reviews.text: Interchanging the links for this watch is an absolute nightmare. The pins are so tight that the tool it came with bent multiple times. I’m not going to use an outside tool to remove them. One of the connector pins also wasn’t secure on one side and was detached inside the box. Picking a different watch is a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this watch. Its very stylish. I recently got into wooden watches, and wanted to get a couple to round out my collection. This was a great introduction to them. The finish is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Tueros

customer_reviews.title: Broken easily.
customer_reviews.text: My husband only wore thus a few times and it broke. Now I can't return it and he's only had it since late August.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch for Dad’s Birthday in October. It is a beautiful watch. He has had many compliments on it, BUT it just fell apart tonight. He loved it so much. I’m so disappointed that it fell apart already.
customer_reviews.author: JBanks

customer_reviews.title: Calendar did not work
customer_reviews.text: Right out the box the calendar did not work. Overall its a nice watch. I like how it looks and feels but will not be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: jakeberry805

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat It For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Fun summer watch. Many of the reviews were poor because of the difficulty adjusting the links on the band. It's pretty easy with the right tools and you need to punch out the pin from the correct side. The video shows you what to do -- and is very helpful because the written instructions, although well meaning, are too small. Knowing what I now know, I would still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: flyfishCPA

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to re-attach strap after adjusting
customer_reviews.text: Really sad, I was really looking forward to wearing this beautiful watch however I am unable to as the strap pins are beyond terrible. Trying to adjust the strap length is impossible. The simple "snap" you're supposed to be able to hear when you push the pins back together doesn't work so the strap keeps falling apart. Will be returning and looking to buy a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Quite impressed..
customer_reviews.text: I like the functionality of this watch, but what the picture fails to show is this watch is actually bronze/orange not brown/dark brown.. very disappointing.. plus when removing the links it’s actually a two piece pin and what they send you for tools/instructions, is not sufficient for the watch and ensuring proper deconstruction/construction of the links. However, I reached out to Bewell after writing my review and they were more then accommodating and strived to make me happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CMack85

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch. I really like the design and features
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. I really like the design and features. One note of caution. If you sweat a lot or live in a humid area, the watch is prone to fogging up. This is my first wooden watch and I do not experience this with my other watches. This watch does fit rather tight on my wrist so maybe if there is more space to "breathe" it won't be a problem for other wearers.
customer_reviews.author: Rochard Webb

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd bewell wooden watch and I love them. Very beautiful watches that receive plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd bewell wooden watch and I love them. Very beautiful watches that receive plenty of compliments. Only problem is they don't last very long and I have done my best to take care of them. Tiny of breaks as they are I can't wear one watch at all and the other is so fragile I'm afraid to. I have contacted the company about trying to repair and have not heard anything in return.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Laabs

customer_reviews.title: great watch super company
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks amazing and I get a lot of compliments. Had a small issue the company fix it immediately. I plan on buying a few more from them as they give you a very personal experience... highly rated seller love their whole platform...
customer_reviews.author: frank walston

customer_reviews.title: Its a very pretty watch, but dont wear it when its hot
customer_reviews.text: Its a very pretty watch, but dont wear it when its hot. It seems to suck up moisture and then the glass fogs.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Its wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful watch, great customer service. Would recommend if looking for a wood watch.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I have to return this watch by warranty, the sub-dials work during a minute and stops & when I reset the sub-dials the top don't return to zero. At first use, a band link broke up. Otherwise, nice design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Attractive Time Piece
customer_reviews.text: This is an enjoyable time piece to wear. It is very light, and the natural wood is comfortable against the skin. Adjusting the band was quite simple (after watching the video). It fits perfectly and I receive compliments whenever I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this watch but like all wooden watches if you wear them a lot and working it breaks. Still really liked this watch it took about a year of dail wear to break but it gave out just next to the Bessel.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew fields

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the watch is what you pay for. It holds up well as I work in construction, and never take it off for work. It was a pain in the ass to adjust the sizing but I have been pleased with this company. I have bought about 5 watches total in 3 years. My first 2 was a horrible experience they broke in less than 3 months as the time/date button broke off, and they never stayed on track. Overnight I would lose about 4 hours, and couldnt change it back since the button broke. They quickly were thrown away. My 3 newest ones have held up very well, and havent had any issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken, 2nd hand was just moving on its own dangling.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Savage

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but pins keep breaking.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd bewell watch ive bought and 2nd one to have a pin break on me. No rough treatment towards watch, I get complaments all the time. But, come on the pin broke as I was laying on the couch!!
customer_reviews.author: Mutt

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I had this watch for only 3 months and I jumped into the pool last week with out realizing that I had my watch on. I got out asap and threw it in a towel and dried it off but the water soaked in and I can't see the face at all. This is not water resistant at all I was disappointed I love the look but it was not resistence for even 30 seconds of like 4 feet of water.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Only last 19months
customer_reviews.text: After 1 year and 7 months this is what happens when you try to change a battery a plastic that holds a battery in its place becomes loose and if you try to put it in it causes the watch to completely stopped working and when you try to put it in again it will cause the fingers to fall off... I don't know if there is a return policy after this long there goes forty bucks
customer_reviews.author: Zombie

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking wooden watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking watch for under $40 dollars. Needed more links because I have bigger wrists so they sent me a defective watch and I was able to put more links on.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Miller

customer_reviews.title: watch not working
customer_reviews.text: Watch is shaky inside and it stops working often. A waste of money
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, but the band was a real pain in the butt to take out links to size it. My husband has a jewelers watch remover kit and is really great with this kind of thing- but even he had a really hard time with. Pretty watch tho- he gets lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Just*Me*In*SC

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Bewell watch I have purchased. great quality. Especially for a watch of this price. The band is easy to adjust. Comfortable to wear. Always get compliments on both of them. Can't go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very Unique
customer_reviews.text: In one word Beautiful. This was a present to a family member. Very unique design and he was thrilled with it. Classic in many ways. Always garners compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Expara

customer_reviews.title: Neat Watch
customer_reviews.text: A fun great watch. The watch is very nice and fun to wear. Had a small issue and the company handled it above and beyond. A pleasure to do business with. Might just buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gift !
customer_reviews.text: Really nice watch not for everyday used, I gave this to my husband for Christmas it’s adjustable he was able to fix it with no problem. It also glows in the dark !
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful watch but literally only last for 2 months, a piece of the band has broke, the minute had has fell off and the face gets water condensation inside just from the Chigago weather. Very sad because my husband loved he watch and of coarse return options ended a month ago. Don’t waste your money, you will just end up disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is truly one of the best things I've ever had. To be able to wear a watch with sensitivity issues and have it affordable is Absolutely top notch. Oh, it works great too!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Perry

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Good looking watch, but lousy mechanism. The dial hands fell off after a few months of wear. They are floating around in the watch, getting stuck, and slowing down the watch. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewed by me

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Breaks out my skin on my wrist, makes blisters. Apparently allergic to something on the watch. But it's a good looking watch and built well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen roberson

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but it is nice
customer_reviews.text: It's very nifty and lightweight. If you happen to react to stainless steel, like I do, this clasp is still not worrisome. It's not perfect as the tool they give you to adjust the links is not quite that strong and the pins happen to lose their washers on the opposite side once taken out. They're small and easy to lose. Aside from those, the stopwatch function works great and the date change is intuitive, along with the watch face.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Schroedter

customer_reviews.title: Good watch: FIXED CALANDER NOT SETTING ISSUE
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE:: Fixed the Calandar problem! All you need to do is turn the knob (takes a few seconds) til the gears wind and catch, twist it toward yourself but if it doesn’t catch try the other way ! Overall a lightweight, nice and fashionable watch. Unfortunately the calendar date setter does not function at all, followed the manual and it should be the first tick pull on the knob but nothing moves when turned.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful... bought for my husband's birthday.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful. My husband loves it. Be aware that the watch is fragile as it's wood and if you need to have it resized, the pins are a locking pin that require some patience to get back together. I contacted the seller with a small issue and they were great about getting it resolved and communicated very effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Y.

customer_reviews.title: It came right away and looked great - the only "complaint" is the instructions to size ...
customer_reviews.text: It came right away and looked great - the only "complaint" is the instructions to size the band were not really clear and I was scared to pressure it so I took the watch to a jeweler who adjusted it quickly at a $15 cost. Runs great, stop watch works fine. Can't complain at all about the watch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Amazing looking watch! Very sporty yet classy! Love the wood! Christmas gift for my grandson so he hasn't tried it yet but looks like excellent quality.. Will review again once my grandson has received it for Christmas. I just know he is going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Wood watch
customer_reviews.text: Works well and keeps time accurately. When I wear it I always have someone ask, " is that watch made out of wood? That's cool."
customer_reviews.author: Richard Moore

customer_reviews.title: The watch looks as nice as the wooden watches that cost $200 plus
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband as a Father's day gift so he hasn't actually worn it yet. The watch looks as nice as the wooden watches that cost $200 plus. It's very light and looks better in person. All parts seem to be working and it arrived fast!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R

customer_reviews.title: really nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: the watch is really nice looking. It's faux wood but looks real and great value for the $$. I wear it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Kennym

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Purchased for my dad, the wood working man, he loves it. Very good quality and comfortable wear.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Peach

customer_reviews.title: Really Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: BF love his gift. He wears it every single day had to remove a few links so that it can fit his wrist perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: FrugalShopper78

customer_reviews.title: very expensive looking and yet functional
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful watch,very expensive looking and yet functional. It was so easy to size.This watch is exquisite in appearance, and I'm already get compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Billger

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an Absolutely Gorgeous Wood Watch!!! Very sturdy but lightweight!! My husband loved it so much that we ordered it in another color as well!!! This watch is not only beautiful it is also backed by Super Awesome Customer Service!!! I have bookmarked this Company and will be buying from them again!!! Great Job BeWell!!! Stay Awesome ╰(*')`*)╯♡
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Wood is good
customer_reviews.text: The idea of a wooden watch is pretty cool just wish it was water resistant and the hands don't glow very good
customer_reviews.author: bebtvb89

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful craftsmanship. Great addition to your wardrobe. Well packaged (presented a gift, just wrapped the box).
customer_reviews.author: SpeedyXN7

customer_reviews.title: Telling Time in Style
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these watches to celebrate my husband's and I 30th wedding anniversary. They are a beautiful pair. The only concern I have is that I wanted to get them engraved but there was no place/room on the back for that.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift, was a bit to large for the arm, but is adjustable. Perfect gift and totally satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Dad really enjoyed the way it looked
customer_reviews.text: I do not know how well the watch actually keeps time , but I can say my Dad truly enjoyed the look of it. He was very happy and excited when I gave it to him. It has a well nice and unique look to the watch and face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they are sending  me a new one
customer_reviews.text: the watch looks great but when i went to remove a link the pins fell out.. they have offered to send me a replacement and said if i bring to a jeweler, they will cover the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Zackary M. Logan

customer_reviews.title: The watch looks better than the pics
customer_reviews.text: I’m waiting to see how it holds up. The watch looks better than the pics. I found it very easy to remove the links with the tool they provided. Kinda curious why so many reviews say its a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bone

customer_reviews.title: Handsome watch that looks sharp on!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves this watch as a gift. I had it engraved on the back and the engravers commented on how beautiful this watch is! It's very unique, handsome, and makes a very special gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch. Very comfortable. Keeps great time. The only negative for me is being older my sight is not what it used to be and the date is a little difficult for me to see. Younger eyes shouldn't have any problem though. Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the watch and like most people have written the ...
customer_reviews.text: update...I like the watch and like most people have written the its very fragile. I did contact customer service and they have done EVERYTHING to make it right. Again, great watch and I would recommend it, just make sure are your pins are tightly in each link.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. K.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATCH
customer_reviews.text: This watch is sooooo stylish. The quality is perfect. The wood tones are vibrant. The face of the watch is easy to read and quite dashing. The links were easy to remove for adjustment size. This was a gift well received and liked. Good Quality
customer_reviews.author: CurlyTop

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch very much
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch very much. Someone is always complimenting it and curious. everywhere i go the people always ask if it is real wood and that is a very different kind of product - the wood feels & looks wonderful and goes well with any dress, and keeps time very well. The customer service for this company is also amazing. I was responded to very quickly and had all of my questions addressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, comfortable and light. Quality is outstanding for the price. I have worn it almost everyday for 8months and never had an issue. Will be looking at another Bewell in a different color. Also makes for nice conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S. Fenocchi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this watch for two months now and honestly pretty good watch. Doesn't pull any hair, feels nice, looks amazing, the only problem was taking out the links was a little scary and harder but probably a good thing and its probably harder to make sure the links don't come apart while wearing it! Overall happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Not like image
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas, but the watch plate isn't wood grained like it shows. More copper. Seems flimsy.. wonder what he'll think.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Carnahan

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful. However, my husband has large wrists and extra links are not available. I was disappointed because I really like the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: S.Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Pictures do not do this justice!
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this for me, for Christmas. All I can say is “Wow” the wood is beautiful, the timepiece accurate. I did have a problem with getting a link out. My fault. I broke the pins. When I asked if I could get another pin, they went over and above fixing my problem. The service was great. I would highly recommend the watch!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Johnston

3 Sub-dials Chronograph Functions, Luminous pointers. Calendar Display at 3 O’clock
44MM Big Dial Diameter.Fit for Who Has Bigger Wrist or Loves Outdoor Sports
Japanese PE903 Quartz Movement to Guarantee a Durable and Accurate Time
